compilations.name: Sweet Recipes That Will Take You To Chocolate Paradise
More Dessert, Less Stress.
compilations.description: Just finished your dinner and still have a bit of room for something more? Nothing too heavy of course. Why not fill it with these delicious mini pumpkin-pie-bites! Still hungry? How about devouring these cute and easy fudge-ice-popsicles? And if you're looking for more then here are all the mini bites you can have so that you can go to bed happy, full and satisfied!

compilations.name: After Dinner Comes Dessert
compilations.description: A crunchy salad, delicious appetizers and a scrumptious main course... Not enough? Dinner leaving you craving for something more? End the night with our most popular and indulgent desserts.. Choose between a . light lemon meringue or a Swedish sticky chocolate cake ! Word from the wise "FEAST ON BOTH!"

name: Swedish Sticky Chocolate Cake (Kladdkaka)
keywords: berries, buzzfeed, cake, chocolate, dessert, international, quick and easy, strawberry, sweden, swedish, sweet, tasty, tasty_vegetarian

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
In a medium bowl, whisk the sugar and eggs until the mixture is pale yellow in color.
Sift in the flour, cocoa powder, and salt.
Fold until incorporated.
Mix in the butter and vanilla.
Grease a pan with butter and sprinkle cocoa powder to coat.
Pour in batter and smooth out. Batter will be very thick.
Bake for 20 minutes or until the top has hardened. The center should still be soft.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar.
Add berries (optional).
Enjoy!

description: Indulge in the decadent deliciousness of Swedish sticky chocolate cake, or kladdkaka. The gooey, fudgy center is the perfect complement to the crispy, crackly top for an unforgettable dessert experience.

Indulge in a rich and decadent chocolate hazelnut dessert that's ready in minutes with this mug cake recipe. Made with simple pantry staples and a generous dollop of chocolate hazelnut spread, this cake is moist, fudgy, and oozing with luscious chocolate flavor.
name: Chocolate Mug Cake

instructions.display_text: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients (except the chocolate hazelnut spread) until just combined.
Once combined, spoon the chocolate hazelnut spread on top of the batter.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug).
Let cool one minute before eating. Top with additional chocolate hazelnut spread and powdered sugar (optional).
Enjoy!

compilations.name: 52 Kid-Friendly Recipes
compilations.description: This selection of 52 (!!) kid-friendly recipes is a lifesaver for all parents. You’ll find easy after-school snacks like pizza chips, healthy but delicious breakfasts like these PB&J overnight oats, along with plenty of fun recipes to make with your kids for brunch or as a weekend activity. And fair warning: lots of these will be a big hit with the grownups, too!

compilations.name: Is This Too Much Chocolate For Your Eyes?
compilations.description: How much chocolate is too much chocolate? These easy and tasty chocolatey treats cover all the bases for the chocolate season. Kick it off with crowd-pleasing classics like a Stuffed Chocolate Chip Cookie, or try a modern and Instagram-ready treat like Cookies 'n Cream Cheesecake Bundt Cake. Whatever you choose, just know that you can never go wrong with chocolate!

Mug cooking is one of the greatest boons of our existence. You can snap up a quick, yet delicious, meal all in one dish. This rigatoni looks fancy AF, but comes out of a mug. Have frequent midnight cravings? Bookmark this pizza in a mug or check out these different flavored mug cakes. For busy mornings, we recommend this blueberry french toast in a mug. Get your mugs ready already!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook In A Mug

compilations.description: Cakes make everything better! And no matter what your favorite kind is — maybe it's the Classic Chocolate Cake or fancy Earl Grey Blackberry Cake — these recipes will satisfy your sweet tooth. Whether you're a beginner looking for a quick dessert fix or a you're pro pastry chef, this cake-themed marathon will definitely make you want to bake.
compilations.name: The Ultimate Cake Marathon

compilations.description: Ever wonder how many desserts you could make using ONLY ice cream? We've got 30 delicious answers, ready for you to try! For a good ol' street-style ice cream, try creating this DIY rolled ice cream. Want ice cream for breakfast? Then check out this easy ice cream bread. And for an epic baking project, try recreating this Cookies & Ice Cream Dome Cake! Let's scream for ice cream, you deserve it!
compilations.name: 30 Ways To Eat Ice Cream

compilations.description: Craving some cake? Who are we kidding: you're always craving cake! We’ve got you covered — and why settle for just one when we have 25 mouthwatering cake recipes to excite your tastebuds? Start with our crowd-pleasing mirror glaze cake or bake to impress with a fancy flowerpot cake.These recipes won't let you down.
compilations.name: These Cake Recipes Will Be A Delight To Your Stomach and Eyes

compilations.description: Summer is here and for us, that means loads and loads of ice cream. Of course, eating out of the pint can get old, so we've got ways to keep you cool and curious with our creamy confections. Whip yourself up a pineapple ice cream float or dig into some decadent brownie ice cream bombs this summer! Or, celebrate taco Tuesday with our chocolate-dipped ice cream tacos. I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream!
compilations.name: 27 Ways To Enjoy Ice Cream This Summer

instructions.display_text: Separate the cream and cookies from 15 chocolate sandwich cookies into 2 medium bowls.
Place the cookie halves in a zip-top bag and crush with a rolling pin until fine crumbs form.
Melt the cookie cream in the microwave for 30 seconds, or until melted.
In a large bowl, whip the heavy cream and vanilla until thickened and soft peaks form.
Add the sweetened condensed milk, melted cookie cream, and cookie crumbs.
Fold with a spatula until combined.
Line a separate large bowl with the remaining sandwich cookies.
Pour in the cream mixture and smooth the top to cover.
Cover and freeze overnight, or until solid.
Invert onto a serving plate, allowing the ice cream dome to release from the bowl. Slice and serve.
Enjoy!

description: This cookies and ice cream dome cake is the perfect sweet treat for any occasion! Layers of crunchy cookies and whipped cream make for a dessert that's as delicious as it is impressive.

compilations.description: Super hungry but too lazy to cook? These super easy snacks will keep all your hunger pangs at bay. From the easy chocolate hazelnut mug cakes to the filling mac n cheese, you can whip up these mouthwatering (and fool-proof!) snacks in no time.

compilations.name: Easy Mug Recipes For Lazy Cooks
compilations.description: Let's face it, no one likes doing the dishes. It's annoying and tedious, but hey, that's no reason to tuck in to another night of Top Ramen. That's where we come in, and so do those long-forgotten coffee mugs. For your sugar cravings, indulge in our blueberry French toast in a mug. Rushing to work? The 3-minute microwave mug omelet breakfast is there for you. And for a late-night pasta delight, tuck into our mug-baked rigatoni. No one will believe that it came out of the microwave, not even you!

Entertaining a crowd and don't have time to fire up your oven? We've got you covered with 33 of our best 3-ingredient desserts. You can pick between a cookie butter cake or cookies & cream ice cream! Or go the classic route and make yourself a delicious batch of brownies. All you need are three ingredients and a sweet tooth (we know you've got that covered). So what are you waiting for? Let's get cooking!

For your midnight cravings, try the quick and easy Chocolate Hazelnut Mug Cake. Have a date night? Impress them with the elegant Chocolate Mousse. Want some comfort food? Bake yourselves a fresh batch of Chocolate Chip Cookie. When it comes to chocolate, more is more!

name: Chocolate Hazelnut Mug Cakes

instructions.display_text: In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together ¾ cup (225 g) chocolate hazelnut spread and the eggs.
Fold in the flour.
Evenly distribute into two mugs.
Microwave each mug for 2 minutes.
Cool for 5 minutes.
Frost with remaining chocolate hazelnut spread and serve warm.
Enjoy!

instructions.display_text: Separate the icing from the chocolate sandwich cookies. Reserve the icing and put the cookies in a resealable plastic bag.
Pound the cookies with a rolling pin until they reach a fine crumble. Transfer to a small bowl.
Mix with the butter until well combined.
Evenly distribute the crumble mixture into a 6-cup muffin tin lined with cupcake liners and firmly press the crumbs to form an even crust in each cup.
In a medium bowl, combine the cream, condensed milk, vanilla extract, and the sandwich cookie icing. Whisk the ingredients until soft peaks form.
Gently form in the cookies.
Transfer the mixture to the muffin tin.
Freeze for 4 hours, or until the ice cream has solidified.
Remove the cupcake liners.
Enjoy!

description: These cute and delicious mini pies are a perfect treat for any occasion, featuring a crunchy cookie crust and a creamy, easy homemade ice cream filling.

Add the chocolate cake batter to a mini frying pan over low heat, and spread to smooth the top.
Cover with a small plate and cook for 30 minutes, or until the cake is set.

compilations.name: Recipes To Get You Through Your Exams

We know it ALL too well, and we're here to help fuel those late night cram sessions with some much needed protein. Power through another lecture with our creamy Java Chip Milkshakeand munch on some healthy Spicy Roasted Chickpeas to keep yourself ready to crush it. We bet you'll love 'em as much as we do!

compilations.name: Recipes For Your Kid's Birthday Party

We've got your back with these handpicked recipes that are filling, yummy and super kid-friendly! Test out our Chili Chese Dog Boats that are messy in all the right, most delicious ways. And, for a fun and sweet surprise, you have to bake up these kid-approved Frosted Sugar Cookies! Tell us: what's your favorite party treat?

You can pick between a cookie butter cake or cookies & cream ice cream! Or go the classic route and make yourself a delicious batch of brownies. All you need are three ingredients and a sweet tooth (we know you've got that covered). So what are you waiting for? Let's get cooking!

Our s'mores brownies are perfect for a summer night by the fire, while our chocolate peanut butter swirl version is a classic flavor combo you won't be able to resist. Want to try something new? Don't sleep on these avocado brownies, and just wait until you see these galactic brownies, which are perfect for a special occasion. It’s time to get baking!

Our baked halibut, Cajun BBQ ribs, and teriyaki chicken are absolutely delicious dinners, and best of all, they each require only three ingredients. Oh, how could we forget about dessert? Our hazelnut brownies and creme brulee are just as simple. From our kitchen to yours, you’re welcome.

There's nothing like food and drink to show your love!

compilations.description: If you're looking for bites of joy and indulgence, look no further than our irresistible truffles (if we do say so ourselves)! Don't think you have to stick to the classic chocolate (a favorite, of course): our summer special, some salted s'mores truffles, are to die for. If you're looking to make something sweet for your sweetheart, the red velvet truffles should be your go-to. We're going truffle hunting, and we're bound to find something delicious!

compilations.name: All About Truffles!
compilations.description: Perfect as a gift for your loved ones or as part of a dessert spread, these cute little dessert bites can do it all! Truffles are amazingly easy to make and will definitely leave the people around you with a smile on their faces. Try 3-ingredient Cookies & Cream Truffles or Banana Bread Cake Truffles for a one-bite delight. Trust us, these balls of heaven are the ultimate decadent treat! Let's get trufflin'!

instructions.display_text: In a bowl sift the flour cornstarch, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.
In another bowl, add the butter, milk, and vanilla. Whisk until well-combined. Cover with a kitchen towel and set aside.
In two large bowls, separate 3 eggs into yolks and whites. Crack the last 2 whole eggs in the bowl with the egg yolks.
Pour 6 tablespoons of sugar into the egg yolk bowl. Mix on high until the batter is thick and pale yellow, about 5 minutes.
Beat the egg whites on high until frothy, then gradually add the 6 tablespoons of sugar. Continue beating until soft peaks form.
Gently fold in the egg yolk mixture into the egg whites.
Add the flour mixture, continue folding until the flour is mixed in. Create a well in the bowl, pour in the butter mixture. Fold all of the ingredients until the batter is smooth and silky.
Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
Pour half of the batter into a smaller bowl. Sift the cocoa powder over the batter. Fold in until the cocoa powder is fully incorporated.
In a greased parchment paper-lined 8-inch (20 cm) cake pan, spoon in a scoop of the vanilla batter in the center of the pan.
Spoon in a scoop of the chocolate batter over the vanilla in the center.
Repeat until you have poured about 6 to 8 layers, keeping in mind you will be spooning in a little less batter each layer.
Using a chopstick or skewer, gently draw a line from the edge of the pan to the center. Repeat until you have made 8 lines. Pour a little chocolate dot in the center.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.

Use a knife or spatula to gently release the cake from the edge of the pan. Cover the cake with a greased plate. Flip the cake on to the plate then transfer to a wire rack to cool. Let cool for about 20 minutes before slicing.
For the strawberry sauce, heat a saucepan over medium heat. Add the strawberries and sugar, and stir until bubbling. Remove from heat.
Serve with strawberry sauce and whipped cream!
Enjoy!

name: Zebra Sponge Cake
description: Add a touch of whimsy to your dessert spread with this zebra sponge cake. Dark and light cake batter are swirled together for a striking and exciting pattern that will impress your guests.

keywords: cake pop, cake pop no mold, chocolate peanut butter pretzel, dessert hack, easy dessert, ice cube tray, ice cube tray desserts, ice cube tray hack, mini cheesecake, no bake dessert, strawberry cheesecake
description: Get ready to pop and lock with these adorable vanilla box cake pops, featuring a fluffy vanilla cake center, coated in creamy white chocolate and decorated with colorful sprinkles. These pops are the perfect addition to any dessert table.

instructions.display_text: In a large bowl, crumble the cake into fine uniform crumbs. Add the vanilla frosting and mix thoroughly.
Press the cake mixture into an ice cube tray. Dip the lollipop sticks into 2 tablespoons of melted white chocolate, then stick them into the center of each cake pop inside the ice cube tray.
Freeze for at least 2 hours or up to 8 hours.
Use a butter knife or offset spatula to loosen the cake pops from the ice cube tray. Pull out the cake pops.
Dip each cake pop in the remaining melted white chocolate. Decorate with sprinkles
Enjoy!

name: Vanilla 'Box' Cake Pops

name: Hong Kong Style Egg Tarts

compilations.description: Get ready to experience tarts in all their glory! Go classic with the silky chocolate tart, or add some zest to your life with our seasonal mango tart recipe. You can also recreate the delicious icing-loaded pop-tart at home. Trust us, you can never go wrong with this popular pastry treat!
compilations.name: How To Make Tarts 6 Ways

compilations.description: Switch up your basic egg breakfasts (or dinners, who are we to judge?) and try out some of these unique recipes that champion the simple, protein-packed food. The Hong-Kong style egg tarts are a delight to the palate and are a great new way to challenge yourself in the kitchen. If you're looking for an exciting new replacement for your run-of-the-mill omelet, give this tortilla de patata a try!
compilations.name: New And Unique Ways To Cook Eggs

yields: Yields: Making 16 egg tarts of a tart pan.

instructions.display_text: For the pastry, in a large bowl, sift flour, sugar, and salt. Then add softened butter. Bring the mixture together with your hands, careful not to knead the pastry dough too much or you will make the pastry tough.

Whisk the egg yolks and add the 2 tablespoons of beaten yolk to the flour mixture. Bring together until smooth. If the dough is too sticky, coating your hands with flour will help. Cover with plastic wrap and then refrigerate for 30 minutes, or until the dough is firm.
To make the custard filling, melt sugar and salt with hot water. Mix until dissolved then let cool.
Add the rest of the beaten egg yolk. Stir in sugar water and also evaporated milk (if adding vanilla, add now). Stir and combine everything well.
Strain the filling to ensure no lumps. Chill in the refrigerator.
Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C.)

Take the dough out and divide into 16 equal portions. Spray the tart pan with a light coating of oil. Take one portion of your dough and roll it into a ball and place in your tart shell. Press the shell into the pan with your fingers. Try to make the wrapper uniform in thickness and avoid a thick bottom. Repeat to finish all.
Pour the custard filling into the shells until it is about 80% full. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the surface becomes golden brown and a toothpick can stand in the egg tart.
Cool down for several minutes and then take the egg tarts out of the pan. Serve while still warm.
Enjoy!

components.raw_text: * 4 medium eggs, beaten (reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry dough)
components.extra_comment: beaten, reserve 2 tablespoons for your pastry dough

components.raw_text: * 2 cups cake flour, plus extra for dusting

description: These Hong Kong-style egg tarts are an irresistible treat with their flaky crust and creamy custard filling. Perfect for any occasion, they will transport your taste buds to the bustling streets of Hong Kong.

components.raw_text: 1 box of Red Velvet Cake Mix cookies

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix everything except the powdered sugar into a bowl (Batter will be thick).
Spoon into balls and roll in the powdered sugar.
Place on cookie sheets leaving about 2 inches (5 cm) between cookies. Level with a glass.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until cookies brown SLIGHTLY on the edges.
Enjoy!

There's everything from the white chocolate raspberry lava cake and the dulce de leche. Just remember, there's so much more than chocolate when it comes to our recipes!

Who said lava cakes can only be chocolate? Try our irresistible gooey Cookie Butter Lava Cake or a fruity Raspberry Lava Cake. With these easy, mouthwatering recipes, you'll be sure to keep coming back for seconds!

Under 30-Minute Meals
compilations.description: Some days we just don't have the time to plan and prep a whole meal. For those days, you can fall back on our flavorful Shrimp Scampi Linguine or easy-yet-filling Baked Salmon. Want to eat something fancy yet quick? Try the 30-minute Chicken Pho or Dulce De Leche Lava Cake. Don't sacrifice flavor just because you don't have the time! These meals take less than 30 minutes and are worth every single bite.

If you're ready for a fiesta, well, then, you're in for a treat! We have a handpicked list of recipes inspired by Mexican dishes that you will absolutely love! Give a fancy twist to your plain-Jane tacos and test out these Crunchy Taco Cups! For a sweeter surprise, you have to try the Dulce De Leche Lava Cake. We bet it'll tickle your tastebuds in all the right ways! It may not be Cinco de Mayo, but who needs an excuse to party anyways?
compilations.name: Mexican-Inspired Recipes You CANNOT Resist

instructions.display_text: In a medium bowl, mix Doce de Leite and melted butter.
In a separate medium bowl, mix egg yolks and eggs. Once combined, mix in Doce de Leite mixture.
Add in flour, a little at a time, to ensure everything is mixed evenly and the batter is smooth.
Line ramekins with butter and flour. Pour out excess flour. Divide Doce de Leite batter in each ramekin. Leave about ¼ inches (6 mm) from the top.
Bake the cakes for 425˚F (220˚C) for 12-14 minutes. The cakes should be golden brown and should jiggle in the middle. The more you bake, the less molten the center will be when you cut into it.
Run a knife along the edges of the ramekin to loosen and invert onto a plate. Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.
Enjoy!

description: Experience the magic of this Dulce de Leche Lava Cake, where a warm, gooey center awaits your spoon. This heavenly dessert is perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth and impressing your guests.

From easy seared scallops to fancy pineapple sweet chili salmon, this is your perfect go to meal to make you feel like you're at a breezy beautiful beach! Call your friends and family over and share this delicious surprise with them.

compilations.name: 30 Recipes To Learn Before You Turn 30
compilations.description: You're in your 20s and faced with the realities of life. One of those harsh ones? The need to feed. Luckily for you, we've got 30 recipes to master before you're 30: the perfect way to feed yourself. Learn how to make a great glaze for your Pork Chops, how you should cook a Steak In Garlic Butter just to your liking, or something even simpler: a perfect batch of Cookies. The ball's in your court, and so are the delicious eats.

keywords: buzzfeed, chive, crab, crab cakes, dinner, lemon, lobster, lobster roll, lunch, party, salmon, scallops, seafood, snack, summer, tasty

instructions.display_text: In a large bowl, whisk together the shallot, parsley, chives, egg, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and cayenne if using.
Add the crabmeat, season with salt and pepper and stir to combine.
Add the breadcrumbs and mix just to combine.
Form into 6 equal patties and place on a plate. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes, up to 1 hour.
Coat the cakes lightly with flour, and shake off any excess.
In a large skillet set over medium heat, melt the butter.
Fry the crab cakes until golden and crisp, 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain slightly.
Serve warm with tartar sauce and lemon wedges.
Enjoy!

description: These crispy crab cakes are a seafood lover's dream. The cakes are packed with fresh crab meat, and are perfectly seasoned with a blend of spices. Serve them as a main dish, or as a tasty appetizer at your next gathering.

name: Cinnamon Roll Poke Cake

instructions.display_text: Prepare white cake mix according to the box instructions and bake according to the  9x13 inch (22cm x 33cm) dish instructions.
In a bowl, mix the butter, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, and condensed milk until smooth.
With the end of a wooden spoon, poke 24 holes in the cooled white cake.
Pour the butter mixture over the cake, smoothing it out into the holes. Cover with a layer of whipped topping.
Chill for 4 hours.
Slice cake and serve.
Enjoy!

compilations.name: Poke Cake Recipes To Have On Weekend

compilations.description: Whether you're in the mood for chocolate or for cinnamon, we've got you covered. These easy and tasty sweet treats cover all the bases for the season. Start with crowd-pleasing classics like cinnamon roll cheesecake or try a modern and Instagram-ready treat like this magic chocolate ball. Whatever you choose, just know that these recipes are loved by all.
compilations.name: Chocolate vs Cinnamon Lover

compilations.description: Everything tastes better with cinnamon! Spice up your mornings with some Apple Cinnamon Steel Cut Oatmeal or indulge in a stack of delicious Cinnamon Roll Pancakes. Make yourself a jar of Cinnamon Honey Almond Butter to pair with toast or your favorite fruits for lunch and bake some Sheet Tray Maple Cinnamon Trail Mix to munch on through the day!
compilations.name: Recipes For Cinnamon Lovers

compilations.description: Cinnamon Rolls are always a hit in every setting but isn't it getting just a taaad bit repetitive?! We're here to change that! Try your favorite cinnamon rolls in new and unique ways! We bet you haven't tested the Bacon Cinnamon Rolls. Yup, BACON! If that's not your jam, try the Mini Cinnamon Roll Bites, they're mini but they will have huge impact on your tastebuds! What are you waiting for? Get that cinnamon roll in your tum-tum!
compilations.name: Unique Cinnamon Roll Recipes
Switch It Up With These Poke Cake Recipes
compilations.description: Let's talk about poke. Our soft and scrumptious poke cakes are so satisfying. Whether it's chocolate peanut butter poke cake, chocolate turtle poke cake, or berry-loaded cheesecake poke cake, you will most definitely be going back for another bite.

description: A dessert recipe that combines the flavors of a cinnamon roll with a poke cake, where holes are poked in a cake and filled with a cinnamon and condensed milk mixture. It is topped with cream cheese frosting.

components.raw_text: 1 box white cake mix, baked according to instructions in a 9x13 inch dish

name: Slow-Cooker Mixed Berry Cobbler
description: Indulge in this heavenly Slow Cooker Mixed Berry Cobbler that'll have your taste buds dancing with delight. Let your slow cooker do the magic as it transforms simple ingredients into a warm, gooey, and irresistible dessert.

compilations.description: Are you ready to bake the best cobbler of your life? You can choose from one of Tasty's several recipes. Whether it's our classic apple cinnamon cobbler, or the iconic chocolate cherry cobbler, you will not be disappointed. Fruity cobblers FTW!
compilations.name: 6 Ways to Make Fruit Cobblers

compilations.description: Got a problem you can't solve? Well, we've got the solution: dessert. There's nothing sweeter than, well, sweets to solve all your worries. From droolworthy Red Velvet Cinnamon Rolls to scrumptious Macchiato Macaroons, we bet you won't able to keep your hands off the table after you give these a try.
compilations.name: Tasty's Top Dessert Recipes

keywords: berry, blackberry, blueberry, buzzfeed, cobbler, delicious, dessert, easy, raspberry, slow cooker, strawberry, tasty, tasty_vegetarian

instructions.display_text: Add raspberries, blueberries, strawberries, and blackberries into the bottom of the slow cooker.
Sprinkle cornstarch on top and mix gently.
Pour cake mix on top of the berries and spread out so it covers the berries.
Place pieces of butter on top of the cake mix and cover.
Cook on high for 2½ to 3 hours, until the cake is fully cooked.
Serve topped with ice cream
Enjoy!

description: A smooth and creamy cheesecake that is simple to make without an oven! This dessert combines the classic flavors of chocolate and cream, and will satisfy any sweet tooth.

compilations.name: 6 Ways To Destroy Your New Year's Resolution
5 Cheesecake Recipes When You’re Feeling  Creamy Or Chocolatey

compilations.description: No oven? No problem. These easy no-bake desserts are just what you need to satisfy your sweet tooth in an instant. Whether you’re in the mood for a glorious Oreo cheesecake or a vegan-friendly panna cotta, this dessert roundup has you covered. And as a bonus, chances are you already have what you need in your pantry. So pick a recipe – and let’s get started!
compilations.name: 7 Satisfyingly Easy No-Bake Desserts
5 Delightful Cheesecake Recipes To Try Tonight
Ultimate Cheesecake Marathon
compilations.description: Hey there! You look like you've had a long day. How about taking a break and spending some time drooling over some stunning & delicious cheesecakes? Try an assortment of quick & easy no bake cheesecakes and or test your baking skills with this super fancy cheesecake tower! Turn up that microwave and let's start baking!

To all the cookies 'n' cream lovers out there, this is your paradise! Welcome to our creamy and delicious dessert tour, with Tasty's most sought after cookies 'n' cream recipes. Cheesecakes, Sandwiches, Eggnog, Truffles, Doughnuts, even classic Homemade Oreos, we've got it all! You can select from an easy and quick 3-ingredient pie or spend an entire day baking an epic vertical cake. So, shall we begin?
compilations.name: Ultimate Cookies 'N' Cream Marathon!
Easy No-Bake Recipes For Lazy People
Recipes To Cheer You Up After You Finish Your Favorite Show
compilations.description: Nothing cheers you up like a good meal, and don't we know it! Kick it off with a set of classic pink velvet donuts or, for something a little lighter, our mango kiwi pineapple sangria. Sit down to your favorite movie, pour yourself a drink, and enjoy these recipes that are the perfect blend of comfort and culinary deliciousness.

name: No-Bake Cookies and Cream Cheesecake

instructions.display_text: Separate the cream from the cookies into 2 different bowls.
Place the cookies into a plastic bag and crush them into fine crumbs with a rolling pin. Set aside ½ cup (50g) of the crumbs for later.
Pour the cookie crumbs into a bowl and combine with the melted butter, mixing until the texture is like slightly wet sand.
Press the cookie crumbs in an even layer into the bottom of a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan. Set aside.
In a medium pot over low heat, mix together the cream cheese, sugar, the cream from the cookies, and vanilla extract, stirring until there are no lumps.
In a measuring cup, mix the milk with the gelatin until dissolved.
Pour the milk into the cream cheese mixture, stirring constantly until the mixture starts to bubble slightly. Remove from heat.
Pour the mixture over the cookie crust in the springform pan. Using a spatula or a spoon, smooth the top.
Sift the saved cookie crumbs on top of the cheesecake in an even layer, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Unclasp the ring of the springform pan, slice, then serve!
Enjoy!

description: Experience a heavenly explosion of flavors with this Chocolate Peanut Butter Lava Cake. It's a decadent dessert that combines the irresistible duo of rich chocolate and creamy peanut butter, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.
name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Lava Cake

compilations.name: Peanut Butter And Chocolate Lovers Only!
5 Dessert Recipes So Easy You'll Impress Yourself
Romantic Three-Course Dinner You Can Make In 30 Minutes
14 Recipes You Should Make For Your Valentine
5 Delicious Ways to Make Lava Cakes
compilations.description: Who doesn't want to indulge in some decadent lava cakes? We've hand-picked the perfect treats to fit every mood and occasion! There's everything from the white chocolate raspberry lava cake and the dulce de leche. Just remember, there's so much more than chocolate when it comes to our recipes!

compilations.name: All The Ways You Can Celebrate Peanut Butter Day
compilations.description: PSA: We can all agree that peanut butter is a magical gift from above, right? And there are so many more ways to use it than in a basic PB&J sandwich. Opt for a gooey Chocolate and Peanut Butter Lava Cake or decadent Peanut Butter Swirl Brownies. For a lighter version, whip up some quick Peanut Butter Banana Bites!

You can never go wrong with chocolate lava cakes, and with these easy mouthwatering recipes, you'll be sure to keep coming back for seconds! Start a classic Chocolate Chip Lava Cookie or enjoy a Giant Molten Chocolate Cake with your friends. Because after all, who doesn't love chocolate?
compilations.name: Tempting Chocolate Lava Cakes
Chocolate Desserts Based On Your Zodiac Sign
compilations.description: It's hard not to love chocolate. But what kind of chocolate dessert do you choose? Your stars have got you covered. The sprinkle-topped Chocolate Doughnut is perfect for the romantic Cancer. The chocolate-dipped Ice Cream Taco matches perfectly with the adventurous Leo. And the hardworking Capricorn shouldn't hesitate to treat themselves with a Magic Chocolate Ball! Chocolate is for the soul, for the heart, and for whatever star fits your fancy.

If you love peanut butter as much as we do, you have to try these must-have peanut butter recipes. Ditch the plain old PB&J and opt for a sweet surprise like our Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups – they're like Reese's pieces of heaven, but better. If that's not enough, follow that up with our melty and gooey Chocolate Peanut Butter Lava Cake that oozes pleasure from inside to out. Tell us: what peanut butter treat coats your heart in ooey, gooey delight?
compilations.name: Peanut Butter Treats You Need To Make Now!

compilations.description: Want to bake something special for someone special? A sweet treat can be a simple way to brighten anyone's day. Check out our collection of awesome cake recipes–you'll be amazed by what you can create! From checkerboard-cake to chocolate-peanut-butter-lava-cake , you deserve to have your cake and eat it too.
compilations.name: Have Your Cake And Eat It Too!

instructions.display_text: In a medium-sized bowl, add dark chocolate and butter, and microwave at 15-second intervals, stirring after each interval until fully melted.
Preheat oven to 425˚F (220˚C).
In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, sugar and vanilla, then pour in the chocolate mixture.
Grease the inside of 4 ramekins with butter and lightly dust with cocoa powder.

Place one ¼ cup (60 ml) scoop of batter into each ramekin, then follow with a small scoop of peanut butter (about 2 tbsp) in the center of each ramekin. Finish with another ¼ cup (60 ml) scoop of the batter.
Bake at 425˚F (220˚C) for 10-12 minutes, or until sides are firm and center is soft.
Using a kitchen towel to hold the ramekin, place the serving plate on top of the ramekin and turn the lava cake out onto the plate (gently shaking the ramekin if needed) until the cake comes out.
Enjoy!

components.raw_text: 1 box yellow cake mix plus ingredients to prepare it

description: Whip up a batch of these delightful Strawberries and Cream Cupcakes for a fruity twist on a classic dessert. With a tender vanilla cake base, fresh strawberry filling, and luscious whipped cream frosting, these cupcakes are a berry lover's dream come true!
name: Strawberries And Cream 'Box' Cupcakes

compilations.name: 5 Ways To Apologize To Your Significant Other
14 Recipes You Should Make For Your Valentine

instructions.display_text: Follow instructions on cake mix to bake. Bake according to package.
While they bake, finely chop five to seven strawberries until they are almost a pulp.
In a bowl, beat the whipping cream, chopped strawberries, and powdered sugar until the mixture forms stiff peaks when the beaters are lifted up. Set aside.

Let the cupcakes cool completely, then cut a hole in each one about the width of a quarter (leave room at the bottom of the cupcake). Press a strawberry, pointed side down into each cupcake, then top with whipped cream.
Enjoy!
